indicator_name: 국제인권법 차별금지기준으로 지난 12개월 동안 차별 또는 괴롭힘 경험을 보고한 인구 비율
target_name: 지속가능발전을 위한 비차별적 법률과 정책의 증진 및 강화

en.target_name: Promote and enforce non-discriminatory laws and policies for sustainable development
en.computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
en.indicator_name: Proportion of population reporting having personally felt discriminated against or harassed in the previous 12 months on the basis of a ground of discrimination prohibited under international human rights law
en.data_name: Experience of being discriminated against in the previous 12 months
en.indicator_definition: The proportion of population who have felt discrimination in the previous 12 months, by discrimination type
en.computation_calculations: Interviews with individuals residing in Korea aged 19 and over
en.graph_title: Experience of being discriminated against in the previous 12 months
en.source_organisation_1: National Human Rights Commission of Korea
en.title: Untitled
